nodes.text: Pere was a member of Kara Xoo's Storm of the Nihil, serving aboard the starship Poisoned Barb. When Xoo had an idea for how she could strike against the Jedi and Galactic Republic after the skirmish on Wevo, she asked Pere how many schools were located on the planet Dalna, and Pere told her there were about a hundred or so. Xoo replied that they had some recruiting to do.
